tool_description: StockFluence.com provides financial sentiment analysis for investors to discover, react and respond to market opinions. We monitor (social) media channels and analyze the overall sentiment with our algorithms. Based on the sentiment, we make predictions with an accuracy level of 70%.
name: StockFluence
title: StockFluence

api_list.name: Fund predictions
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stock.p.rapidapi.com/v1/prediction/AAPL"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stock.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://stock.p.rapidapi.com/v1/prediction/{fundsymbol}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stock.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
